reviewText: Heard about Red Dawn forever, finally bought this combo for like $5, not the current price of $17. I guess I can see why it's raved about, but come on. You have to be completely in the dark about the real world to imagine this happening. And if it did, that the response of the US would be like this. Frankly, I'm amazed that it isn't panned as being completely naive and paranoid. But whatever, folks like it. Didn't watch Navy Seals at all. Tossed the dvd overboard after watching Red Dawn (was on my sailboat, had brought this to watch on my laptop). But I'm giving it 5-stars cuz I only do 5 or 1, love something or hate it, no in between. It's not a 1 so 5 is what it gets. Thought Swayze sucked in this, and would consider him a hack actor if not for Point Break with Keanu Reeves, one of the great movies of all time.
summary: Wilfull suspension of common sense helps.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Both Navy Seals and Red Dawn are some of my favorite action movies. Patrick Swayze and Charlie Sheen are two of my favoriteactors. John Wayne is at the top of my list and always will be.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: I bought this DVD because Patrick Swayze has been one of my favorite actors for a long time, and since his death I wanted to get some of his movies. Red Dawn is an excellent one and with the world situation like it is, I can see something like that happening any time. I would have ended it a little differently, but it was a good movie.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Both movie's are great. Patrick does a great job of acting. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys Patrick Swayze's acting abilities. Other than Ghost and Dirty Dancing, these movies are right up there.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Red Dawn is a classic!  Patrick Swayze, God bless him, excelled in this cold-war saga even as a young man and early in his career.  This is a film that is not only fun to watch but a film you will want to see many times in the future!
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Navy Seals is the classic style military shoot em' up with elite U.S. soldiers invading terrorist encampments in the mideast. Very good movie. Blackhawk Down is better though. Now to the GOOD one. RED DAWN IS ONE OF MY FAVORITE MOVIES REGARDLESS OF CATEGORY, EVER. The opener should send chills down your spine because some of this HAS ALREADY HAPPENED. Cuban and Russian forces land on U.S. soil(you read that right) and take over about one state's worth of land. A small group of teenagers fight for their lives in the mountains with Cubans in military like gunfights. Tanks, grenades, machine guns, everything. Once again, read the opening lines VERY CAREFULLY and realize:THIS COULD ACTUALLY HAPPEN NOW. You call Red Dawn a movie? Me and a lot of other people call it a SURVIVAL MANUAL. THIS MOVIE COULD SAVE YOUR LIFE. I mean it. Highest possible recommendation!
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Lots of action and moments of intense emotion. your never know what to expect in these heart pounding action filled movies
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Both of these movies are dynamite, exciting, interesting and convey a good message.  Patrick Swayze, Michael Biehn and Charlie Sheen are on my list of favorite actors.

reviewText: I got this because of Red Dawn movie. It is very good movie, good plot, good action, and very good acting. It is a older movie with no rap music, four letter words, and nudes walking around. I love it.  Navy Seals is a regular average movie. It is basic  both are a real family movie. There is no such thing as a good war.  Buy this one a classic.

reviewText: A Superb Collection of 2 Great 80's Movie's.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals

reviewText: Yeah, neither one of these movies is a classic, but they are guilty pleasures.  Of the two, the Red Dawn story line strains credibility the most, yet is the best acted of the two films.  Every character in Red Dawn is believable, and the ending will tear your heart out.
Title: Red Dawn / Navy Seals
